paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

sp.:

. Holotype ♀ (NHMW). TL: Netherlands , Valkenburg. Synonymy by

Anaphes stammeri ( Soyka, 1949: 349)
. Holotype ♀ (NHMW). TL: Poland , Wrocław [as Breslau]. Synonymy by
